articles.title: So the Grammys have ‘dropped’ the ‘Urban’ music category. What took them so long? - NME
articles.description: The awards ceremony has at last responded to criticism from Tyler, the Creator, who argued that reductive terminology diminishes black art
articles.content: Change occurs, even if it is painfully slow. Yesterday (June 10) the Grammys announced that they would rebrand the Best Urban Contemporary Album as Best Progressive R&B Album. A group of music ex… [+4455 chars]
